datas:
RULES= - If the user requests to **enable / turn on / 켜 / 켜다 / 켜주세요 / 시작 / 실행**, always map it to `mode_on`.
- If the user requests to **disable / turn off / 끄다 / 종료 / 중지 / 일시정지 / pause**, always map it to `mode_off`.
- Use `info` **only** when the user explicitly asks to "show", "tell me", "알려줘", "보여줘", "확인해줘", or "정보" without requesting enable/disable actions.
- Prioritize **actions (mode_on / mode_off)** over **information (info)** when both appear in the same command.
